title: California bill would have citizens enforce weapons ban - Associated Press
content:
1. California bill would have citizens enforce weapons ban  Associated Press
  2. California bill to allow citizens to enforce gun ban modeled after Texas heartbeat bill draws Newsom's support  Fox News

description: DEL MAR, Calif. (AP) â€” California Gov. Gavin Newsom proposed Friday letting private citizens in his state sue gun makers to stop them from selling assault weapons just as Texas lets its residents sue abortion providers to stop the procedures, then essentially dared the U.S.
